alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Hinds (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 4:46PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Hinds and north central Copiah Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 446 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dry Grove, or 8 miles northwest of Crystal Springs, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Hinds and north central Copiah Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
